required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Retroperitoneoscopic Donor Nephrectomy: a Retrospective Single-center Study

brief_summary.textblock: to compare the results of right and left-sided retroperitoneoscopic donor nephrectomy (RDN).

detailed_description.textblock: This was a retrospective study evaluating demographics, intraoperative and postoperative data of 158 kidney donors who underwent RDN from January 2010 to August 2018. Two groups were created according to the side of the surgery including Right RDN (group 1) and left RDN (group 2). The results of the recipients' were also evaluated.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of the surgery
primary_outcome.description: time from onset to complete of surgery

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of the surgery
at the end of the surgery
primary_outcome.description: time from renal artery and vein dissection of the kidney to the initiation of perfusion on the bench table.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of the surgery
primary_outcome.description: abnormal problems that may be seen during surgery and require additional intervention.
abdominal incision or trocar site defects of donors
abnormal problems that may be seen after surgery and require additional intervention or follow-up (grade I-V)

study_pop.textblock: 158 consecutive kidney donors undergoing pure RDN for allotransplantation at Ondokuz Mayıs University from January 2010 to August 2018. All operations were performed by a single surgeon (E. O.).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult donors
- Kidney donors undergoing retroperitoneoscopic donor nephrectomy
- Recipients of the kidneys
- Donors with the consent form
- Recipients with consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- open donor nephrectomies
- donors without the consent form
- Recipients without the consent form

results_reference.citation: Ratner LE, Ciseck LJ, Moore RG, Cigarroa FG, Kaufman HS, Kavoussi LR. Laparoscopic live donor nephrectomy. Transplantation. 1995 Nov 15;60(9):1047-9.
Hsu JW, Reese PP, Naji A, Levine MH, Abt PL. Increased early graft failure in right-sided living donor nephrectomy. Transplantation. 2011 Jan 15;91(1):108-14. doi: 10.1097/TP.0b013e3181fd0179.

Kumar A, Chaturvedi S, Gulia A, Maheshwari R, Dassi V, Desai P. Laparoscopic Live Donor Nephrectomy: Comparison of Outcomes Right Versus Left. Transplant Proc. 2018 Oct;50(8):2327-2332. doi: 10.1016/j.transproceed.2018.03.034. Epub 2018 Mar 16.

patient_data.ipd_description: It is not yet known if there will be a plan to make IPD available.
